name: FunwithFragrance
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to weekly updates from Fun with Fragrance posted every Wednesday morning. Go to our site using your browser to place orders, sign up to be an independent consultant, host a party, or contact us directly! 

Https://dmcgregor.scentsy.us

You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

The information provided by this skill is for informational and educational purposes only and is not intended for the direct sale of any product or service. priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
